DOC.brief_summary: To test hypothesis add estradiol ( E2 ) progesterone supplementation later luteal phase vitro fertilization ( IVF ) /intracytoplasmic sperm injection ( ICSI ) cycle , rather early luteal phase , improve clinical pregnancy rate ( PRs ) .
DOC.brief_title: Timing Estrogen Support During Luteal Phase Vitro Fertilization ( IVF ) /Intracytoplasmic Sperm Injection ( ICSI ) Cycle
DOC.detailed_description: Several study report elevated E2 may detrimental effect endometrial receptivity embryo . This conflict start point study . The investigator think luteal decrease E2 level could prevent add estradiol receptivity window open , instead add earlier luteal phase could result defective embryo implantation .
DOC.criteria: All patient long GnRH agonist protocol control ovarian hyperstimulation see IVF clinic February November 2008 , E2 level day hCG administration > 2500 pg/dl Presence azoospermia require testicular sperm extraction procedure endometriosis great stage II unilateral oophorectomy , polycystic ovarian syndrome ( PCOS ) secondary infertility age great 40 yr basal follicle stimulate hormone ( FSH ) level high 12 mIU/ml exclusion criterion
